citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:25 am on July
24, 2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by phone and spoke with licensee who was not
available. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA
and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:25 am on July 
24, 2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by phone and spoke with licensee who was not 
available. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA 
and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
